(Hey, we're just waiting for the right time to update the character 
page......)


Scavenger/Pyro/Hiss/Minion/Chaos/Sixshot/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/Demon Wulf:



Scavenger fired ten rapid optic blasts at the incoming missile.

---

Pyro swerves the cannon on his turret, firing off a single fire ball at 
Sharpedge.

---

Hiss fired off three blasts from his fusion cannon, taking a few steps back 
from each blast he fired and its kickback.

---

Flesh Ripper gets knocked to the ground from the missile, but gets up quickly.

---

"If one of us are attacked, the brethren shall aid him." Demon Wulf said, 
raising his sword to point at Sharpedge, the blade lancing out, now a 
missile, heading for Sharpedge.  The missing blade is replaced by a new one 
in Demon Wulf's sword.

---

Dark Claw curses, putting his hands together, dangerously pulling them out 
quickly into a new blue sphere.  With one hand, he threw the sphere up at 
Jetstorm.

---

Minion got knocked down from the optic blasts, his chest smoking.  He fired 
off twenty-five optic blasts up at Jetstorm.

---

Spinned, only a few blasts catching him in the side.  Yelling out in pain and 
anger, he fired off three blasts at Jetstorm from his laser rifle.

---

Sixshot activated his missile launchers, getting a target lock, and firing 
down two missiles at Jetstorm.
